title: Permabanned for 3rd party hacks/script Please RIOT
body:
Ok I got my first acct perma banned for scripting but im not a scripter. I will fully admit that I downloaded and used scripts in two games just because i saw some talk about it and just wanted to see what it was. I felt like it was clumsy and not easy to use. I had the acct since season two had played thousands of games have spent countless dollars and never even intended on continuing to script. I was literally just to see what it was like. I dont see how RIOT can justify perma banning a loyal player for this one time infraction. I loved my acct and have so much time invested in it. I get it i broke the rules but perma is to much. Strip me of rewards and give me suspension but please have mercy RIOT. I just want one more chance to have this acct back. 

The acct im talking about is "LokiToke" and any RIOTer that can help me please do.

EDIT

The whole thing wasnt intentional on the lokitoke acct. I had scripted on a lvl 5 acct to test out and forgot to uninstall programs and logged into a game with loki. I switched them off during the game but the program was still up and running during two games just not active. Thats what makes this frustrating is that this technicality doesnt matter and since program was running it really cant be proven that i did or did not actually use the scripts on loki. Also the lvl 5 acct was banned too.

replies.body: You knew third party programs aren't allowed and you used your main account to "try it out"? Haha justice will be done. {{champion:12}}  You can't milk those {{summoner:31}}
lol great vid though by alistar
Sucks when there are racists getting off with a 14 day and you get perma for downloading a program.
Trolls in chat can be muted m8, scripts can't. Someone who is toxic in chat is a completely different issue than scripting, something that can and will affect the game.

Well, yeah a perma is hard.
Scripting is hard too.
You dont just accidentally download scripts.
You do it knowing fully well what you are doing, and if it jsut weren't so clumsy you woudlve been scripting until you got banned.

>  I dont see how RIOT can justify perma banning a loyal player for this one time infraction

Because its is a pretty severe violation..

Perma is justified imho, and definitly shouldnt be lifted

> but im not a scripter

Yes, you are.
Thats exactly what you are....

You break the rules you get the punishment. Telling a judge you just wanted to try out killing wont get you out of it. Its written in the terms of use that they can ban your account at any point for breaking the rules and you broke the rules in the most obvious way.
It's ok, you have few more accounts. Though it was dumb of you to use scripts on your main or other accs got banned too ?
"I'm not a drug dealer, I just sold crack two times to see what's it like and never intended to sell it again"

Sorry to say, but your account is gone. You used scripts on 2 games, which means that you atleast intentionally tried to get an advantage by use of scripts. The fact that you didn't like them doesn't change that. 

You fully knew the consequences, yet you did it anyways, and this is your punishment.

IMO ban 100% justified.
